first_trimester_diet: Eat folate-rich foods like spinach, lentils, and oranges. Avoid raw papaya and alcohol.
second_trimester_diet: Include iron-rich foods like leafy vegetables, jaggery, and eggs. Also, add calcium like milk and paneer.
labour_signs: Labour signs include water breaking, frequent contractions, and lower back pain.
vaccination_schedule: TT injections are given during pregnancy. Consult your doctor for the exact schedule.
